name: PixelRocket
description:
PixelRocket is an endless top-down-shooter, where you have to pilot a spaceship through a labyrinth and fight enemies.

This project was a school project. And afterwards I tweaked it and added some more content into it.

Controls

  • accelerate - "W"
  • direction - "mouse position"
  • slow down - "Space"
  • fire primary weapon (gun)- "Left mouse button"
  • fire secondary weapon (rockets)- "Right mouse button"
  • pause - "Escape"
  • zoom in - "E" / out - "Q"
  • change camera mode - "Tab"

Your goal is to reach the portal, which is located in the top right corner, to get into the next world.

The green bar represents your health. When you get hit by an enemy or a wall you lose health and when you complete one world you will regain your health completely.

The blue bar represents the amount of rockets you can shoot. It will decrease when you use them, but regenerate after some time completely.

Contact me

If you encountered a problem, want to leave feedback, or anything else, please feel free to let me know anyhow you like or use this email: dominik.dec.help@gmail.com

You need java version 1.8.0_31 or greater to play this game.
